text:
SVGAElementBridge does not overload getInstance() and therefore only one 
bridge is associated to all <a> elements in one file. It becomes a issue when 
dynamic updates are made to the DOM.

Is there any reasons why the SVGAElementBridge does not overload 'getInstance
()' ?
creator: nicolas.socheleau@bitflash.com

text:
code change SVGAElementBridge revision 1.18
run the tests manually in samples/tests/spec/linking and they passed.
creator: nicolas.socheleau@bitflash.com
